column5: [QUOTE=prov1800;6710033]I forgot about the glacier,I could live in there all winter,when you get hungry just drop a jig in!
[QUOTE=Eckohlt;6710037]Would be awesome catching fish while watching some NFL or NHL.
[QUOTE=prov1800;6710065]Just set some rattle wheels and kick back n relax,with a ice cold root beer in hand,lol
4-5 inches here over the weekend and going into the deep freeze for this week as well. Be interesting to see what lake levels do this year!
Pic of the Vermilion Bay dock from different angle and the old peer from long time ago.Had blue skies that day.Few more months and it will look totally different again.

John, do you ever ice fish Eagle? Seems like Gord said they did but maybe not right there around the govt dock area and his lodge. Pretty picture, no snow for us in Georgia so far this year, still hoping though! Off to Tennessee this weekend to fish musky, will let you know how it goes. Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
looks a bit snowy in your neck of the woods today sir.

[QUOTE=Camoclad;6709907]John, do you ever ice fish Eagle? Seems like Gord said they did but maybe not right there around the govt dock area and his lodge. Pretty picture, no snow for us in Georgia so far this year, still hoping though! Off to Tennessee this weekend to fish musky, will let you know how it goes. Let me know.I do toward spring.Actually pretty good within a couple of miles of government dock.Few good humps were the walleyes hang out around strawberry Island.Trout are all over the lake but have a couple good spots close for them to.Right now the ice shacks just have me spoiled.Comfy and warm and don't have to drag a sleigh full of gear.lol.But will go out more in end of March when weather changes.-30 expected tonight.brrr.
Snowed 3" or so last night and have very strong winds.-30 next few days.Not looking forward to that.
Roads are ugly today going to town.
[QUOTE=prov1800;6709995]You just need to talk to Wayne about a recliner for you in shack,so your good n comfy n flat screen tv for the games.
[QUOTE=Eckohlt;6710001]Just sounds like I need to get in that Glarcier.No TV in there yet.
No krumbs.few other things.Temp going to -30 for a bit so just get some stuff so I don't have to start my truck for a while.
